reviewText: Wow.  If you love big steam locomotives, this is a delight!  I'm a railfan, and a mechanical engineer, and this DVD gave me both smiles and jaw-drops.  Some scenes are BIG, with large majestic views of awe-inspiring inertia; others are intriguing close-ups of the kinetic dance of elegantly choreographed, perfectly-balanced linkage.  My favorite DVD on the subject!
